TextLibrary.Text: We need to learn about these creatures. They're practically super-human.
We need to learn about these creatures. They're practically super-human.
We should take it to the Silent One.
We should take it to the Silent One.
We should get away from the Jahrwoxi. My vote would be to head to Quesada. The Priests there know everything.
We should get away from the Jahrwoxi. My vote would be to head to Quesada. The Priests there know everything.
